See the example url. If you resize the textfield with the label "Opmerking", the location where the button with the label "Toevoegen" isn't relocated while the button itself is. It seems that the focus is not shifting according to the relocating of the button.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Go the mentioned URL
2.Resize the textfield with the label "Opmerking" making sure that the button with the label "Toevoegen" is relocated on the screen
3.Try to click on the button -> Not possible as the clickable part of the button is still in its old location
Actual Results:  
Cannot click on the button itself, you have to click on the old location of the button.

Expected Results:  
You should be able to just click on the button
